law.catch_line: Premises that may not be licensed for sales at retail.
law.text: No license for the sale of alcoholic beverages at retail shall be issued for any premises unless the applicant for the license is the owner of the premises or is in possession of the premises under a written lease or a permit for a term of not less than the license period.
law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 125, sec. 4, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 289, sec. 5, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 121, sec. 13, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 194, sec. 15, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 1. -- Amended 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 154, sec. 13. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2554b-174, 2554b-175, 2554b-177.
